column1: '''A Fourteenth-Century Romance''' is the title of an essay written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in the magazine ''[[Radio Times 4 December 1953|Radio Times]]'' on [[4 December|December 4]]
column2: [[1953]]. The article consists of the foreword to Tolkien's translation of ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight (edition)|Sir Gawain and the Green Knight]]''
column3: which was broadcast on the BBC Third Programme in 1953.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' on TolkienBooks.net</ref>
